Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-43552 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.33-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-43552 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.33-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package mysql is earlier than 8.0.33-1, affected by CVE-2022-43552
